articles.title: Game Recap: Fever Rout Dream at Gainbridge Fieldhouse to Force Game 3 - Indiana Fever
articles.description: A return home was just what the Indiana Fever needed. Playing in front of a loud and fiery Gainbridge Fieldhouse crowd decked out in red “Now You Know” t-shirts, the Fever rolled to a 77-60 win over the Atlanta Dream on Tuesday in Game 2 of their …
